00260      
00266     public static class ButtonListener2 implements FieldChangeListener {
00267         Citation c;
00268         CitationScreen2 cs2;
00269                     
00270         public ButtonListener2(CitationScreen2 _cs2, Citation _n2){
00271             cs2 = _cs2;
00272             c = _n2;
00273         }
00274                     
00275         public void fieldChanged(Field field, int context) {
00276             ButtonField btn4 = (ButtonField) field;
00277             if(btn4.getLabel().toString() == "Next"){ 
00278                 cs2.storeUIFieldsToCitation();
00279                 UiApplication.getUiApplication().pushScreen(new CitationScreen3(c));
00280             }
00281             else if(btn4.getLabel().toString() == "Prev"){
00282                 cs2.storeUIFieldsToCitation();
00283                 UiApplication.getUiApplication().popScreen(cs2);
00284             }   
00285         }
00286     } 
00287     
00293     static final class DMVButtonListener2 implements FieldChangeListener {
00294         private CitationScreen2 cs2 = null;
00295         
00296         public DMVButtonListener2(CitationScreen2 _cs2){
00297                 cs2 = _cs2;
00298         }
00299         
00300         public void fieldChanged(Field field, int context) {
00301                 ButtonField btn = (ButtonField)field;
00302                 if (btn != null) {
00303                                 Status.show("Retrieving DMV record...");
00304                         QueryMgr query = ((CitationApp)UiApplication.getUiApplication()).getQueryMgr();
00305                         CPerson cp = (CPerson)query.findDMVRecord(cs2.field_id.getText());
00306                         if (cp != null) {
00307                                 cs2.field_last.setText(cp.getElement(CPerson.LAST));
00308                                 cs2.field_middle.setText(cp.getElement(CPerson.MIDDLE));
00309                                 cs2.field_first.setText(cp.getElement(CPerson.FIRST));
00310                                 cs2.field_address.setText(cp.getElement(CPerson.ADDRESS));
00311                                 cs2.field_city.setText(cp.getElement(CPerson.CITY));
00312                                 cs2.field_state.setText(cp.getElement(CPerson.STATE));
00313                                 cs2.field_zip.setText(cp.getElement(CPerson.ZIP));
00314                                 cs2.field_DOB.setText(cp.getElement(CPerson.DOB));
00315                                 cs2.field_endorsements.setText(cp.getElement(CPerson.ENDORSEMENTS));
00316                                 cs2.field_height.setText(cp.getElement(CPerson.HEIGHT));
00317                                 cs2.field_restrictions.setText(cp.getElement(CPerson.RESTRICTIONS));
00318                                 cs2.field_sex.setSelectedIndex(cp.getElement(CPerson.SEX));
00319                                 cs2.field_weight.setText(cp.getElement(CPerson.WEIGHT));
00320                         }
00321                         else {
00322                             StringBuffer msg = new StringBuffer("Unable to retrieve DMV record.\n\n");
00323                             msg.append(query.getLastError());
00324                             Dialog.inform(msg.toString());
00325                         }
00326                 }
00327         }
00328     }

00345     private MenuItem getItem2 = new MenuItem("Get", 110, 11) {
00346         public void run() {
00347                 
00348                 CitationStore.Restore();
00349                 restoreUIFieldsFromCitation();
00350            
00351         }
00352     };     
00353     
00357     private void storeUIFieldsToCitation()
00358     {
00359 
00360         String person_sel = rad_person.isSelected() ? "true" : "false";
00361         c.Person.setElement(CPerson.PERSON_SELECT, person_sel);
00362         c.Person.setElement(CPerson.PERSON, rad_person.getLabel()); 
00363         System.out.println("Store Function -> PERSON = " + rad_person.getLabel());
00364         
00365         String business_sel = rad_business.isSelected() ? "true" : "false";
00366         c.Person.setElement(CPerson.BUSINESS_SELECT, business_sel); 
00367         c.Person.setElement(CPerson.BUSINESS, rad_business.getLabel()); 
00368         System.out.println("Store Function -> BUSINESS = " + rad_business.getLabel());  
00369           
00370         c.Person.setElement(CPerson.ID, field_id.getText());
00371         c.Person.setElement(CPerson.ID_STATE, field_idstate.toString());
00372         c.Person.setElement(CPerson.TITLE, field_title.toString());  
00373         c.Person.setElement(CPerson.FIRST, field_first.getText());
00374         c.Person.setElement(CPerson.MIDDLE, field_middle.getText());
00375         c.Person.setElement(CPerson.LAST, field_last.getText());    
00376         c.Person.setElement(CPerson.SUFFIX, field_suffix.toString());    
00377         c.Person.setElement(CPerson.ADDRESS, field_address.getText());
00378         c.Person.setElement(CPerson.CITY, field_city.getText());
00379         c.Person.setElement(CPerson.STATE, field_state.toString());          
00380         c.Person.setElement(CPerson.ZIP, field_zip.getText());
00381         c.Person.setElement(CPerson.DOB, field_DOB.getText());
00382         c.Person.setElement(CPerson.SEX, field_sex.toString());
00383         c.Person.setElement(CPerson.RACE, field_race.getText());
00384         c.Person.setElement(CPerson.EYES, field_eyes.toString());
00385         c.Person.setElement(CPerson.HAIR, field_hair.toString());
00386         c.Person.setElement(CPerson.ENDORSEMENTS, field_endorsements.getText());
00387         c.Person.setElement(CPerson.RESTRICTIONS, field_restrictions.getText());
00388         c.Person.setElement(CPerson.HEIGHT, field_height.toString());
00389         c.Person.setElement(CPerson.WEIGHT, field_weight.getText());
00390         c.Person.setElement(CPerson.OBSERVATIONS, field_observations.getText());
00391         c.Person.setElement(CPerson.NUM_OF_VIOLATIONS, field_violations.toString());
00392     }
00393  
00398     private void restoreUIFieldsFromCitation()
00399     {
00400         boolean person_sel = c.Person.getElement(CPerson.PERSON_SELECT).equals("true");
00401         rad_person.setSelected(person_sel);
00402                
00403         boolean business_sel = c.Person.getElement(CPerson.BUSINESS_SELECT).equals("true");
00404         rad_business.setSelected(business_sel);
00405                    
00406         field_id.setText(c.Person.getElement(CPerson.ID));
00407         field_idstate.setSelectedIndex(c.Person.getElement(CPerson.ID_STATE));
00408         field_title.setSelectedIndex(c.Person.getElement(CPerson.TITLE));
00409         field_first.setText(c.Person.getElement(CPerson.FIRST));
00410         field_middle.setText(c.Person.getElement(CPerson.MIDDLE));
00411         field_last.setText(c.Person.getElement(CPerson.LAST));
00412         field_suffix.setSelectedIndex(c.Person.getElement(CPerson.SUFFIX));
00413         field_address.setText(c.Person.getElement(CPerson.ADDRESS));
00414         field_city.setText(c.Person.getElement(CPerson.CITY));
00415         field_state.setText(c.Person.getElement(CPerson.STATE));
00416         field_zip.setText(c.Person.getElement(CPerson.ZIP));
00417         field_DOB.setText(c.Person.getElement(CPerson.DOB));
00418         field_sex.setSelectedIndex(c.Person.getElement(CPerson.SEX));
00419         field_race.setText(c.Person.getElement(CPerson.RACE));
00420         field_eyes.setSelectedIndex(c.Person.getElement(CPerson.EYES));
00421         field_hair.setSelectedIndex(c.Person.getElement(CPerson.HAIR));
00422         field_endorsements.setText(c.Person.getElement(CPerson.ENDORSEMENTS));
00423         field_restrictions.setText(c.Person.getElement(CPerson.RESTRICTIONS));
00424         field_height.setText(c.Person.getElement(CPerson.HEIGHT));
00425         field_weight.setText(c.Person.getElement(CPerson.WEIGHT));
00426         field_observations.setText(c.Person.getElement(CPerson.OBSERVATIONS));   
00427         field_violations.setSelectedIndex(c.Person.getElement(CPerson.NUM_OF_VIOLATIONS));
00428     }
